sn21.4:1.2: The rare verb saṅkasāyati is used alongside allīyissanti (Kd 3:1.2.3) suggesting the sense “adhere” and a derivation from kasāya (“gum, resin”). | The time for sewing robes was the kathina season after the rains residence (MN 122:2.15).
sn21.4:6.4: The ten armies of Māra are detailed in Snp 3.2.
